author: leif
msg: Add a way for users to invoke a GC from the HTML interface.
Add a few additional handlers for XML needed for the swing client.

author: mcconnell
msg: add project packages during javadoc generation

author: leif
msg: If File.createNewFile was called on a file that already existed, it was causing calls to FileUtil.forceDelete to
fail.  That sounds like an issue with the File class.  But this was being caused by a previous test not cleaning up after itself correctly.

author: leif
msg: If an exception was thrown while copying files then both
the input and output streams were being left open. Code review.

author: crossley
msg: The Community and Howto tabs are removed until we decide what to do with them.
The docs still remain, but are not linked.
